name: Hidden Cats: Magic Forest
description:
Hidden Cats: Magic Forest is a hidden object game where you'll search for hidden cats while exploring the mysteries of the magical forest.

  • Find cats in black, white, and orange colors. Lift old trees and plant saplings in their place to create new trees.
  • Discover the Hidden Egyptian Cat God.
  • Learn interesting facts about cats.
  • Touch the magical texture of the forest and interact with other surprise objects to earn all the achievements.

If you enjoy games like "A Building Full of Cats" and "Hidden Through Time," Hidden Cats: Magic Forest could be a perfect choice for you.
